function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Incomplete coverage of drug information in existing ontologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient representation of vaccine information in ontologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of misinformation due to incomplete ontology-based approaches","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to community-based metadata standardization for clinical and experimental studies.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical pandemics recurring every 30 to 40 years","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overload of hospitals and quarantine facilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changing living styles and uncertain conditions leading to the need for infectious disease-friendly building designs","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historically, pandemics have always had an impact on risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited technology, knowledge, and resources make historical solutions to pandemics not applicable worldwide.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of good sunlight and air flow in building design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate cleanliness and surface
